Quick Tips for Better Prompts

💡

Be Specific

Replace "Write about marketing" with "Write a 500-word blog post about email marketing for SaaS startups."

🎭

Use Role-Playing

Start with "You are an expert [role]" to give the AI context and expertise to draw from.

📋

Provide Examples

Show the AI what you want with 1-3 examples of the desired output format or style.

🚫

Set Constraints

Tell the AI what NOT to do: "Don't use jargon" or "Avoid mentioning competitors."

🔄

Iterate and Refine

Start with a basic prompt, test it, then add details and constraints to improve results.

📊

Request Structure

Ask for specific formats: "Provide 5 bullet points" or "Use headings and subheadings."
